original_text: Jesus spoke to the people again. He said, ‘I am the light of the world. Those people who become my disciples will never walk in the dark. No, they will have the light that gives life.’
korean_text: 예수께서 또 말씀하여 이르시되 나는 세상의 빛이니 나를 따르는 자는 어둠에 다니지 아니하고 생명의 빛을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: Jesus spoke to the people again.
I am the light of the world.
Those people who become my disciples
will never walk in the dark.
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 어둠 속을 걷지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: No, they will have the light
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 그들은 그 빛을 가질 것입니다
